The development of sport is a state policy in Azerbaijan, and the Azerbaijani state has taken concrete steps for the development of Azerbaijani sports.
The development of sports in Azerbaijan is very successful and I can say that our experience is being studied and applied in some countries.
The interest of young people in sports is particularly important. Of course, sports should be a daily routine for every human being.
Today, the world is known as the sport state of Azerbaijan. We have earned this title by our labor, the efforts of our athletes and the coaching staff.
The sport management system in Azerbaijan is also perfect.
The activity, based on thoughtful, purposeful programs, provides excellent results.
Our athletes win both Olympic and non-Olympic sports every year win hundreds of medals.
As an independent country, we have won at Atlanta Olympic Games, three in Sydney, five in Athens, and seven medals in Beijing.
For the first time in our history, Azerbaijan is a great figure in the Olympic Games.
This time, the number of our athletes to participate in the Olympic Games is 53. This, of course, once again shows our sport potential.
We all wish all the Azerbaijani people athletes success and their expectations.
I am confident that our athletes will represent Azerbaijan in the XXX Summer Olympic Games and return to their homeland with great victories.
